column1: Dawadmi or Ad Dawadimi (Arabic: الدوادمي‎) is a town in Riyadh Province
column2: Saudi Arabia. As of the 2004 census it had a population of 53
column3: 071 people.It is located on top of Najd hill
column4: the central area of Saudi Arabia. It is about 200 kilometres (120 mi) west of Riyadh. By road
column5: is located 320 kilometres (200 mi) by road west of Riyadh.

column2: the new airport in the city was inaugurated by the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia. King Abdulaziz palace is a landmark of the city and there is an ongoing rehabilitation project to protect it.
